ticket.title: [PATCH] actionpack route_set tests failing on ruby1.9.1p376

version.body:
+1 to Santiago's patch, it makes more sense.
We have benchmarked the performance differences between `respond_to?` and `is_a?` and they are negligible.
version.body-html:
+1 to Santiago's patch, it makes more sense.

version.body: Sorry, but the patch is invalid. We are not supposed to receive an array there, I will investigate why we are receiving an array there and fix it.
